distros.name: Linux Mint
distros.description: Linux Mint is a community-driven Linux distribution based on Ubuntu, focused on providing a complete out-of-the-box experience.

distros.name: Zorin OS
distros.description: Zorin OS is designed to be user-friendly and features a Windows-like desktop layout, making it ideal for those transitioning from Windows.

distros.name: Pop!_OS
distros.description: Pop!_OS is an Ubuntu-based distribution by System76, featuring a unique desktop environment and focusing on usability.

distros.name: Aurora
distros.description: Aurora is a user-friendly Linux distribution with a Windows-like interface, designed for ease of use.

distros.name: Fedora KDE Plasma Desktop
distros.description: Fedora with KDE Plasma desktop offers a powerful and customizable environment with excellent development tools.

distros.name: Fedora Workstation
distros.description: Fedora Workstation is a professional-grade operating system focused on development and productivity.

distros.name: Bluefin
distros.description: Bluefin is a stable and reliable Linux distribution based on Fedora, optimized for development and daily use.

distros.name: Bazzite KDE
distros.description: Bazzite KDE is a gaming-focused Linux distribution with KDE Plasma desktop, optimized for gaming and Windows-like experience.

distros.name: Bazzite GNOME
distros.description: Bazzite GNOME is a gaming-focused Linux distribution with GNOME desktop, providing an excellent gaming experience.

distros.name: CachyOS
distros.description: CachyOS is an Arch-based distribution optimized for performance, featuring excellent development tools and Windows-like layout.

distros.name: Lubuntu
distros.description: Lubuntu is a lightweight Ubuntu variant using LXQt, perfect for older hardware and providing a user-friendly experience.

distros.name: Linux Lite
distros.description: Linux Lite is designed for older hardware and Windows users, providing a familiar and lightweight computing experience.
